title: Ep 532 | How Jase and His Son Go Golfing Without Clubs & How Much Should You Love Your Life?
description:
Al discusses how God can use authenticity to bless others in relationships and conversations with strangers. Jase tells a wild story about losing his golf clubs while his son's clubs were locked inside their own case! Al explains how Phil hilariously responds to being told about someone else's problems. Larry Bowles explains being defined by what he does vs. by what he doesn't do and highlights the Bible's surprising comment on loving your own life. And Jase explores the recurring themes of the book of Hebrews.

https://talkshop.live/watch/kNa2Qoub38oD — The ONLY place to get your signed copy of "Your Daily Phil" by Phil Robertson

Go to https://UnashamedMerch.com and use Code: Unashamed10 for 10% off and BlazeTV Subscribers get 20% off with the Code: BlazeSub

Sign up to watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed

Visit https://PatriotMobile.com/PHIL or call 972-PATRIOT and get free activation

Visit https://BollandBranch.com and use promo code: Robertson and get 15% off your first set of sheets
